roleset.name: destroy utterly
roleset.note: ANNIHILATE-V NOTES: VN updated by Julia. Member of Vncls destroy-44, murder-42.1. (from annihilate.01-v)
ANNIHILATION-N NOTES: Roleset based on instances in BOLT-P01, nouns parts 1& 2. Maps to verb annihilate.01, which is member of Vncls destroy-44, murder-42.1. (from annihilation.01-n)

example.name: military
example.text: The army annihilated the small city with a few well-placed bombs.

example.name: With ext only
example.text: Israel is Western , civilized , the progenitors of the first Christian community , and facing total annihilation every day of its life , thanks to being surrounded by psycopathic states .

example.name: Args 0 & 1
example.text: ...fighting lasted until around 10 August as U.S. troops continued their annihilation of the Japanese force.
